signals: The website uses English language and targets cities, municipalities, HoReCa, retail, food producers, charities, and upcyclers globally.

valueProps.text: Zipli provides a real-time food tracking platform to cut waste costs and improve social wellbeing.
Zipli automates redistribution logistics and compliance for HoReCa and retail.
Zipli's mobile app matches excess food with organizations in need.

pains: Mismatch in food systems where one third of all produced food goes to waste.
Cities and municipalities struggle to meet food waste reduction goals.
proof: AI-powered data platform for overview, insights, and action.

facts.text: One third of all produced food goes to waste.
facts.evidence: One third of all produced food goes to waste while millions of people cannot afford quality meals.

facts.text: Zipli offers a real-time food tracking platform.
facts.evidence: Meet climate, food waste, and social policy targets by utilizing Zipli's real-time food tracking platform and communication tool.

facts.text: Zipli helps cities and municipalities cut waste costs and improve ESG compliance.
facts.evidence: Cut waste costs, strengthen ESG compliance, and improve social wellbeing.

facts.text: Zipli automates redistribution logistics for HoReCa and retail.
facts.evidence: Reduce disposal costs and simplify food donations by automating redistribution logistics and compliance.

facts.text: Zipli's mobile app matches excess food with organizations in need.
facts.page: Mobile app for every-day food matchmaking
facts.evidence: Our mobile app solves the daily headache of redirecting excess food to people in need.

facts.text: Zipli provides AI-based recommendations to reduce waste.
facts.evidence: And on top of it all, we provide users AI-based recommendations on measures to take to further reduce waste and meet impact goals.

facts.text: Zipli offers auto-generated reports for ESG tracking.
facts.page: AI-powered data platform for overview, insights and action
facts.evidence: Use our auto-generated reports for ESG tracking and faster stakeholder communications.

facts.text: Zipli's platform helps food producers turn surplus into savings.
facts.evidence: Turn extra food into good use by making donations easier to handle and report.

facts.text: Zipli provides a consistent and diverse supply of surplus food for charities and upcyclers.
facts.evidence: Get access to consistent and diverse supply of surplus food.

facts.text: Zipli's AI-powered platform offers real-time insights on food flows.
facts.page: AI-powered data platform for overview, insights and action
facts.evidence: Our real-time insights will help you get an overview on food flows and detailed data on your positive impact.
